sentences.sentence: The main materials it sells include fire hydraulic giant, fire hose, indoor and outdoor fire hydrant, firebox 1211 and 302 fire extinguisher, etc.
sentences.translation: 它卖的主要材料包括：火液压巨头、灭火水龙带、消防水带、室内外消防栓、1211消防箱、和302灭火器等等。
“看到那个消防栓了吗？”森池问道。

sentences.sentence: An open fire hydrant cools off a Washington, D.C., resident during a heat wave this month.
sentences.translation: 本月，热浪无情袭击华盛顿特区，当地居民说必须要有消防水龙头来为华盛顿特区降温了。
